content.rendered:
Interior Design

What interior design services do you offer?

Homely in Kolkata, an Interior Designer in Kolkata, offers the customers to select innovative and latest interior designs, helps with executing space planning, suggests innovative ideas for colour and furniture selection, etc. Also, we offer our customers shift furniture without damage to any interior wall for maintaining the Vaastu rules in both residential and commercial places.

How much does interior design typically cost?

We provide the best services along with the best materials. So, it is a bit expensive, but it mostly depends on the material quality because we offer a reasonable cost for our service.

Do you offer consultations before starting a project?

Definitely, we meet our client for the consultation about any project start. We take sufficient time to execute any project with full satisfaction.  

How long does the typical interior design project take?

It takes some time to complete any project because of our working strategy. We never apply fit-to-all beliefs. We research the best plan for our client as their residential place becomes a healthy environment in the house, comfortable with classical space and design. Also, we believe in providing elegant services to our clients. So, a certain period is required to complete our project, mainly depending on the project plan.  

What is your process for working with clients?

i) At first our interior designers in Kolkata go through detailed research, planning, and coordination with the client before starting any interior design for a residential project.

ii) For commercial projects, our design experts assist the company owner with several classic design ideas as the product brand and the niche of the company become more attractive and easier to work with.

iii) Our expertise makes a detailed workspace of the project with design and budget according to the client’s requirements.  

iv) We work with complete trust and transparency with our clients and privilege our clients to give their suggestions regarding the decoration. We provide suitable design ideas for different things for the short to long term according to the necessity of the customer’s company and meet all important bodies of the company for planning purposes.  

v) We provide the best service to our customers along with rational charges. We hire experienced and the best interior designers to execute the project from the start of the project planning.

Can you help me find furniture and décor items?

We involve our clients in every step of planning and execution. We give you complete leverage, starting from the material you need to the finished products.

Do you offer any financing options?

It depends on the project type and occasion.

What are the benefits of hiring a professional interior designer?

A professional interior designer has many working experiences and innovative as well as the latest ideas of interior design, from furniture to curtains and colour combinations. The experienced designer can plan that thing that can provide the highest graceful life and environment in the customer’s interior part of the house.

 

False Ceiling Design

What are the different types of false ceilings you offer?

Décor Enterprise has the Best False Ceiling Design ideas, such as PVC, Aerolite Calcium Silicate False Ceiling, Armstrong false ceiling, and several types of false ceiling bedrooms (Layered False Ceiling, LED Strip Lighting, Circular or Curved Designs, Textured Ceiling etc.), Gypsum Board False Ceiling, Gypsum Laminate Grid False Ceiling, Metal False Ceiling Designs, Plaster of Paris False Ceiling Designing, Hilux Calcium Silicate False Ceiling & Partition, etc. We provide false ceiling services in different sectors, like bedroom false ceilings for residential places, different offices, banquet halls, hotels, industrial sectors, and showrooms. There are several types of designs that have been provided in the showroom false ceiling (suspended ceiling, coffered ceiling, gypsum and plaster of paris, and wooden false ceiling, etc.). Mineral Fiber, perforated metal, fiberglass, and wood are used as materials for Armstrong false ceilings.

What are the benefits of installing a false ceiling?

There are many benefits to affording a false ceiling, along with the best design idea at a low cost in Kolkata. The benefits are:

  • It is very easy to install and suitable to hide wiring and AC ducting. Due to its lightweight, it can be uninstalled and reinstalled without breaking the materials and room wall. So, it is cost-efficient. 
  • It maintains the smoothness and beautification of the house.
  • It is a sound absorber and reflects light, so it consumes electricity and enhances insulation characteristics.
  • It can resist moisture, bacteria, mildew, and sagging, as well as be fire-resistant and prevent fire.
  • The product is durable, and it has a modern and versatile feature along with a stylish design that enhances the room decoration with more perfection and creates an aesthetic appeal. Also, it is affordable for the long term.
  • It is eco-friendly and has a dust controller capacity.

How much does a false ceiling typically cost?

Initially, the False Ceiling Cost in Kolkata is quite costly but conservative for long-term use, protection, maintenance, and durability. The average cost of an Aerolite false ceiling is from₹2,000 to₹4,000 per square meter, including materials and installation costs, and further design and accuracy in finish increase the cost. The cost varies with different types of design and materials. Like,

  • The false ceiling design cost range for bedrooms is from ₹70 to ₹150 per square ft. for the basic design. Also, this rate varies on design along with lighting decoration materials, then it goes to approximately 500 per square ft. or more.
  • The cost of gypsum board false ceiling price range is ₹ 80 to ₹ 500 per sq. ft.

What factors will affect the cost of a false ceiling?

The cost of a false ceiling mostly depends on the quality of the material, the complexity of the design, and the size of the room and project length.

How long does it typically take to install a false ceiling?

Though it fully depends on the project. Because the total process is completed in three steps: framing, boarding, and finishing. The time is varied within 7 to 10 days approximately.

Do you offer any maintenance services for false ceilings?

We provide installation service at an affordable price without compromising the product quality, and very little price is charged for the maintenance service.  

What are some things to consider when choosing a false ceiling design?

There are some factors that have been considered in selecting the false ceiling, and these are the quality materials, durability, style, resistance power, budget-friendly, etc. The height and area of the ceiling from the floor are necessary for the selection of the false ceiling types, and light is another important element; moreover, a suitable design with style and colour combination plays a vital role in choosing the false ceiling. However, our main moto is to provide the best false ceiling design ideas with reasonable cost in Kolkata and pan India.

Can you help me choose the right lighting for my false ceiling?

Sure, we will help you to select the best light combination for your false ceiling with superior guidance from our expertise along with the Best False Ceiling Design ideas for you.

 

Modular Kitchen Design

What are the benefits of a modular kitchen?

Modular kitchen manufacturer in Kolkata, Decor Enterprise, is sharing its experiences about some benefits of a modular kitchen in everyday life, which are space efficiency or management, customisation, increased storage, ease of installation and repair, durability, etc. Moreover, its decorative quality and good look enhance the house’s healthy environment. A modular kitchen makes people’s lives easier as it accommodates all kitchen appliances near the hand with well arrangement, and it makes a good kitchen experience.  

What materials do you use for your modular kitchens?

We use wood materials to prepare the structure of a modular kitchen.

How much does a modular kitchen typically cost?

There are no limits to the costs of a modular kitchen. It depends on the customer’s needs, materials, style, and appliances. The modular kitchen price range in Décor Enterprise in Kolkata is INR 7500-200000.

What factors will affect the cost of a modular kitchen?

There are many elements that affect the cost of a modular kitchen, like appliance attachment, cabinets, countertops, woodwork, unique designs, placement of shelves, number of sink installations, customer’s need or style, finishing part, and charges of installed units there.

Do you offer any financing options for modular kitchens?

Sorry, there is no such offer for this option.

How long does it typically take to design and install a modular kitchen?

It depends on the workload, that is the design quality and its application expansion.

What is your process for designing a modular kitchen?

First, our staff checks the space where the modular kitchen will be set up. Then we consult with our engineer, designers, and staff for the space planning of the customer’s house or place.

Can you help me choose the right appliances for my modular kitchen?

Definitely, we help our all customers with all the required asking and choosing their kitchen set-up.

What are some things to consider when designing a modular kitchen?

Décor Enterprise, a Modular kitchen manufacturer in Kolkata, considers the triangle shape to easy access things, considers the space optimisation for the maximum use of the space and item segregation storage for easy access as well as the luxury look and workflow, and is careful about the needs of storage for all accessories and a stylish look. We also provide our services to construct different-shaped modular kitchens.
